revised_title: The Influence of Astigmatism on Optical System Response
tldr: The author investigates the impact of astigmatism on the response function of an optical system using Fourier analysis. They develop an analytical study of astigmatic optical systems and provide a simple criterion for testing astigmatic systems. The study also determines tolerances on astigmatism and Petzval curvature, and compares the results with geometrical treatment.
